reviewText: Nothing at all like I expected - it moves to fast for my daughter to really grasp the facts and commit them to memory - it doesn't help with the memory at all.  My daughter sat with the remote to try to stop and pause it while she wrote notes.  She is younger (2nd grade) but this was not at all what we were hoping for.
The DVD content was presented on a such a low level, it didn't hold my daughter's interest and not worth as much as was paid.
